Canadas.Handyman.Challenge.S02E04.Top.Fifteen.Finalists.HDTV.x264-CLDD.mp4

Canada's Handyman Challenge
Season 2, Episode 4: TOP FIFTEEN FINALISTS
Original airdate: February 12, 2013


Episode description:
In this episode, the top fifteen handyman hopefuls travel to Toronto and are divided into teams for a wallpaper challenge. After two hours, two contestants are sent home. The second challenge will have the contestants prepare and hang a mirror to precisely match previously hung paintings on a mock living room wall. They will have one hour to complete the challenge and the worst job will have one more contestant hanging up their tool belt.



Show description:
Canada's Handyman Challenge is hitting the road again for a second season on a nationwide search for the best all around handyman except this time around there is a $25,000 prize up for grabs. Contestants will be put through rigorous challenges to test their handyman skills in order to win the coveted title of Canada's Best Handyman.

Teaming up for the first time as judges are HGTV celebrities Scott McGillivray (Income Property), Bryan Baeumler (Leave It To Bryan, House of Bryan) and Paul Lafrance (Decked Out, Deck Wars). This all-star team of judges will travel to Vancouver, Halifax and Toronto to hold LIVE auditions and recruit talented hopefuls. In each major city a top four will be selected to represent their regions (West, East and Central) forming our top twelve. These twelve will progress to Toronto to compete and strut their handyman talents. The ultimate handyman Mike Holmes (Holmes Makes It Right, Holmes Inspection) will weigh in on who will be crowned the winner of Canada's Handyman Challenge II and be awarded a $25,000 cash prize.
